alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 9:10AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northeastern Piscataquis...Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties... At 908 AM EDT...An area of heavy snow showers was 7 miles north of Fish River Lake, or 7 miles east of Deboullie Mountain...moving east AT 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Houlton, Fort Kent, Madawaska, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Van Buren, Eagle Lake, Allagash, Deboullie Mountain, Portage, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Hodgdon, Ashland, Easton, Woodland and Frenchville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 287 and 304. US Highway 1 between Hodgdon and Fort Kent. State Highway 11 between Knowles Corner and Fort Kent. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for brief snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
